name: East Coast Fever
symptoms: High fever, swollen lymph nodes, difficulty breathing, loss of appetite
treatment: Early treatment with parvaquone or buparvaquone, tick control, vaccination available

name: Mastitis
symptoms: Swollen udder, abnormal milk (clots, discoloration), reduced milk production, fever
treatment: Antibiotic treatment, proper milking hygiene, regular udder health checks

name: Newcastle Disease
symptoms: Respiratory distress, nervous signs, diarrhea, drop in egg production
treatment: Vaccination is key prevention, no cure for infected birds, isolate and cull affected birds
